While he was smaller then normal his face was still recognizable as the rich man Bruce Wayne, the three villains were shocked by reveal of identity their greatest foe. The first to recover was Harley who summed up all their thoughts "Holy crap!".

As the fact sunk in the women's smiles only grew larger because not only did they have their enemy at their mercies but to also have one of the richest men in the world as prisoner was just an added bonus.

"Hmm what a pleasing turn of events wouldn't you say Bruce." teased Ivy as she leaned over putting her face right in front of the shrunken super hero, all she got was a glare that had scared many a criminal but it had lost much of it's effect from him being only a few inches tall.

"Now we can figure out what to do with this info later for now what shall we do with our little toy?" asked Cat-woman grinning deviously, the ladies decided to?

151111.content:
It was your typical night in Gotham, criminals robbing or mugging and cops trying to stop them. But tonight wasn't going to be a normal night as a certain jester outfit wearing sociopath named Harley Quinn was just finishing up robbing a building where new scientific advancements were being done. What she stole was a new type of ray gun that could make transportation of cargo much easier by shrinking it down to a tiny size. Just as Harley was about to make her getaway a dark figure wearing a suit resembling a bat landed in front of her. At first she thought it was Batman, but she noticed the feminine figure and quickly realized it was actually his female sidekick Batgirl. The female vigilante then spoke, "Stop Harley, return what you stole or you're going to be more black and blue then red and black when I take you to Arkham". The female jester then laughed, she then started to speak, "Oh really darling, you think you'll be able to hurt little ol' me". Harley then turns on the ray gun and points it at Batgirl, she then says, "Lets cut you down to size". Before she could react Harley pulls the trigger and Batgirl is then hit by a beam coming from the gun. The effects from the gun happen immediately and soon Batgirl notices the world around her getting bigger as she shrinks. After holding down the trigger for a few more seconds Harley lets go and admires her handy work. Batgirl was tiny now and couldn't do a thing to Harley now she was smaller than an actual bat. Batgirl now stunned as to what just happened and just sat there as the giantess jester walked over to retrieve her prize. She stops a few inches in front of her and bends down to grab the small vigilante. Harley picks up Batgirl between her fingers and brings her to eye level. She then smiles, thinking about what she can do to Batgirl.

How big is Batgirl and what does Harley do to her first?
151111.title: No small problem to Harley

info.brief_description: Batman is somehow shrunk, or someone he knows somehow grows. GTS/SM/SW  GP for good adds.
info.description:
Batman is shrunk by or near a friend or enemy. Or a female fiend or enemy can grow.

Other Characters can shrink.


Some of his female enemies include : Catwoman, Poison Ivy, and Harley Quinn.

Some of his female allies include: Batgirl (any) Oracle(Barbara Gordon, ex Batgirl) Vicky Vale, The Birds of Prey: Black Canary, Huntress etc.

Other comic characters can cross over like Wonder Woman, or Supergirl.

I will allow any fetish, try to keep farts and toilet to a minimum though.
Sex, vore, feet breasts are fine, and encouraged.

I will give gift points for good additions, as in at least two good paragraphs.

Well have fun!

EDIT:

You can have the characters out of costume. But if you reveal Batman or one of his allies identities to an enemy, make sure you leave the option open so his identity isn't revealed. Or maybe he will be so small the villain can't recognize his face.

Thanks for all the great ideas and additions guys.
